phrases: Between catching a cold and trying to help Sota with his first girlfriend,
I used up a lot of time.
But at last, I have returned to the Feudal Era with Inuyasha.
Now we can get back to tracking Naraku's whereabouts.
Though we sure wasted a lot of time on stupid things.
He is digging his own grave again.
So Naraku disappeared in the direction of the Ox-Tiger.
The way I see it, it is in that direction.
The divine oracle has been received!
It is said that when a cat's tail becomes two,
You mustexpel the feline from the village,
orthere is sure to be misfortune!
Were you following the sound of hervoice?
Now let us go home, Kuroro.
I told you that is not Kuroro!
I am sure we chased it far away from the village.
You must not bare yourfangs against humans.
Are you in league with that demon cat?!
Who you calling a demon cat?!
Cats are vengeful creatures and will curse you for seven generations.
Besides, that cat is not Kuroro!
The villagers have been awfully rude to you!
But why are you all frantic over one cat?
Kirara seemed to take to herso well.
She must be a girl with a kind heart.
Avery smart cat named Kuroro lived in this village.
It used to play often with the children of the village.
a very important faith healer passed through the village.
And he read an oracle that said that a two-tailed cat was bad forthe village
That is why the village girl mistook Kirara forKuroro.
I feel badly forthe children of the village,
but we cannot afford any calamity to hit ourvillage.
It is pretty harsh to expel one poor cat from the village.
Something is fishy about this faith healer.
I think we should meet this faith healer.
Maybe he is got an aching belly
from eating a feast he is not used to.
Where can I find that girl I saw?
The one you put the bell on was not Kuroro.
You are looking for a cat named Kuroro, right?
the faith healeris in the shrine on the village outskirts.
I do not think she is here.
You really cared forthis cat, huh?
Kuroro is going to have babies.
We will have to go higherup!
Not a sign of the frightful cat in the village.
the rats will play and devour everything in sight!
the demonic aura has created a barrier.
The faith healer is a demon in disguise.
Well, I are not standing forthat!
I will break through that stinkin' barrier!
So, you show yourself... rat demon!
I see that you are actually a half-demon.
How dare you, a half-demon, defy the Great Tesso!
Hmm... he may be large, but he still fears cats.
No wonderyou did not want the cat that the children loved around!
Well, I are not wasting any more time to get rid of you!
The Wind Scardidn't work on him?
That is not the demon's true appearance.
He is probably a demon created by the demonic aura of the rats.
Asword will go right through it.
should take care of that rat in an instant!
Kuroro, where are you taking us?
Yes, now let us go back to the village.
The scent of a human child!
I will double my spiritual rat power!
It is too dangerous to go out now!
Let Kuroro handle the outside; we will protect these kittens.
How many times must you interfere?!
He probably got scared of us and fled the village.
I do not think he will abandon the village
aftergoing through the trouble of getting rid of the cat.
Then he is still close by?
That is the bell that Shippo had in his possession.
That cat is trying to take us somewhere.
It is getting... hard to breathe.
Just a while longer and I will be through to the other side.
There should be a human child in there.
Move, so that I can eat her!
As if I would allow that?!
The wound Kuroro inflicted is gone!
Eating a human child to increase yourpower!
That is a sickening thing to do!
Have you forgotten that you cannot harm me?!
He does not have the wound that Kuroro inflicted upon him!
So that is where you have hidden yourtrue self!
Kuroro ignored the injuries that she sustained
and led us to you two.
Everyone, it is time to eat.
We will be togetherforever and ever, Kuroro...
Looks like you did pretty good.
If you are a man, it is yourjob to protect a woman.
It is admirable that you had no ulteriormotives.
I wish someone else would heed those very words.
I will bet you were in love with her!
I will bet you had the hots forher!
This is the scent of the herbs that Urasue was using!
You mean the demon woman who reincarnated Kikyo?
Kikyo cannot be manipulating Urasue's soldiers!
Do not tell me there are still puppets in this world that possess human souls!
Next on Inuyasha: Plot of the Walking Dead
Urasue was supposed to have died!
